About Me

My programming journey...

I’m a web developer who currently resides in Santa Ana, CA. I spend my days working in many different areas of web development from back end programming (PHP/Codeingniter, Node.js/Express.js, Golang) to front-end infrastructure (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript(ES6)/Vue.js), web accessibility, and user experience.

I have a true passion for web development and helping small businesses and fellow web developers build and improve their online presence. Aside from web development, I enjoy spending my time with my wife, daughter, brewing beer, camping, hiking and watching sports (baseball, pro/college football, and soccer).
